name: MoonBound (toona)
description: Moonbound is a visual novel/dating sim in the world of mooncord. Explore the different routes to find out what happens. You play Chat-Kun, who is in love with the best looking girl in the school, Luna Luna. Unfortunately Chat-Kun is pathetic and a loser. You must survive the trials of Jesse Anime Memorial High school in order to confess your love to Luna and get the girl. Good luck.
